description: The BGP Established event is generated when
the BGP FSM enters the ESTABLISHED state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-MIB::bgpEstablished BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError s EX BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState.192.168.112.10 i 1

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState

description: The BGPBackwardTransition Event is generated
when the BGP FSM moves from a higher numbered
state to a lower numbered state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-MIB::bgpBackwardTransition BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError s EX BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState.192.168.112.10 i 1

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState

description: The bgpEstablishedNotification event is generated
when the BGP FSM enters the established state.
This Notification replaces the bgpEstablished
Notification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-MIB::bgpEstablishedNotification BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerRemoteAddr a 192.0.2.1 BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError s EX BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState i 6

description: The remote IP address of this entry's BGP
peer.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState

description: The bgpBackwardTransNotification event is
generated when the BGP FSM moves from a higher
numbered state to a lower numbered state.
This Notification replaces the
bgpBackwardsTransition Notification.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-MIB::bgpBackwardTransNotification BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerRemoteAddr a 192.0.2.1 BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError s EX BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState i 1

description: The remote IP address of this entry's BGP
peer.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode seen by this
peer on this connection. If no error has
occurred, this field is zero. Otherwise, the
first byte of this two byte OCTET STRING
contains the error code, and the second byte
contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerLastError

description: The BGP peer connection state.
variables.name: BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState
